short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decorates Chromium Commits on CrBug with Version indicators

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrolling through issues on CrBug and wondering when a certain commit landed in a Chrome release? No longer manually look it up on Chromium Dash, but instead get the version info directly in CrBug!
